rows.name: help_text
rows.value:
This will have a collection of quick 1 to 10 minute routines in various categories.

Here is a very tentative list of kinds of routines that will be included here:

* Subitizing dot talks - develop counting skills, unitizing skills, counting on skills
* Choral counting - count together as a group. Counting on, skip counting, counting down, estimate and then count
* Target number - have a number of the day. See how many ways the number can be created. Add restrictions to the ways allowed to guide the practice.
* Equality concept - find ways to create the same value on two sides of an equal sign
* Number Line - put a collection of numbers on a number line or number path
* "I have ... I wish I had" - how many more do you need? Counting on, counting down
* Shape talks - talks involving shape properties
* Fluency practice
* Which One Doesn't Belong or Who is the Spy or Each of these things is different from the others
* Short math games - Nim 1-2, I'm Thinking of a Number
